Class XMLTagUtils

java.lang.Object
com.xml.editor.XMLTagUtils
public class XMLTagUtils extends Object
Utility class providing methods for manipulating and analyzing XML tags.

The XMLTagUtils class contains static methods to split XML tags and content, check if XML tags are matched, and create corresponding opening and closing tags. These utility methods are useful for processing and validating XML structures.

Example usage:

     List tokens = XMLTagUtils.splitTagsAndContent("<tag>Content</tag>");
     boolean isMatched = XMLTagUtils.isMatched("<tag>", "</tag>");
     String closingTag = XMLTagUtils.createClosingTag("<tag>");

  • Method Details

    • splitTagsAndContent

      public static List<String> splitTagsAndContent(String line)
      Splits a line of text into a list of tokens, separating XML tags and content.
      Parameters:
      line - the line of text to be split.
      Returns:
      a list of tokens containing XML tags and content.

    • isMatched

      public static boolean isMatched(String openTag, String closeTag)
      Checks if a given closing tag matches the corresponding opening tag.
      Parameters:
      openTag - the opening XML tag.
      closeTag - the closing XML tag.
      Returns:
      true if the closing tag matches the opening tag, false otherwise.

    • isOpenTag

      public static boolean isOpenTag(String token)
      Determines if a given token is an opening XML tag.
      Parameters:
      token - the token to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the token is an opening XML tag, false otherwise.

    • isCloseTag

      public static boolean isCloseTag(String token)
      Determines if a given token is a closing XML tag.
      Parameters:
      token - the token to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the token is a closing XML tag, false otherwise.

    • createClosingTag

      public static String createClosingTag(String openTag)
      Creates a corresponding closing tag for a given opening tag.
      Parameters:
      openTag - the opening XML tag.
      Returns:
      the corresponding closing XML tag.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the opening tag is null or empty.

    • createOpeningTag

      public static String createOpeningTag(String closeTag)
      Creates a corresponding opening tag for a given closing tag.
      Parameters:
      closeTag - the closing XML tag.
      Returns:
      the corresponding opening XML tag.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the closing tag is null or empty.
